entry.title: Flood Warning issued October 23 at 8:36PM EDT until October 26 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Florida... St Johns River Near Astor affecting Volusia and Lake Counties. .The Saint Johns River near Astor is forecast to continue falling through Minor Flood Stage through midweek. The river is forecast to fall near to below Minor Flood late this week.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Lake; Volusia
